content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO

select a.device
        ,b.location
        ,b.vessel
        ,a.date_key
        ,c.day_name
        ,a.metric_count
FROM (
    select device   
            , date_key
            , count(1) as metric_count
    FROM
        silver.vw_device
    where date_key > 20230501
    group by device   
            , date_key
) a 
LEFT JOIN silver.devicedetail b
    on a.device = b.serialnumber
LEFT JOIN silver.calendar c
    on a.date_key = c.date_key
Order by date_key desc, device
